mapper.sql: UserID, UserName, LoginID, Password, IsDisable, Sex, Birthday, Email, Wechat, Telephone, Description, LoginTime, Remarks, CreateTime, CreateUser, UpdateTime, UpdateUser, IsDelete, Version
mapper.select:
select
from PASSPORT_USER where UserID = #{userID,jdbcType=INTEGER} and IsDelete = 0

select
from PASSPORT_USER where LoginID = #{loginID} and Password = #{password} and IsDelete = 0

from PASSPORT_USER where LoginID = #{loginID,jdbcType=INTEGER} and IsDelete = 0

select
from PASSPORT_USER where IsDelete = 0 order by UpdateTime desc limit #{start}, #{pageSize}
mapper.update: update PASSPORT_USER set UserName = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, Birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=CHAR}, Email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Wechat = #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UpdateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UpdateUser = #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Version = Version + 1 where UserID = #{userID,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update PASSPORT_USER set Password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UpdateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UpdateUser = #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Version = Version + 1 where UserID = #{userID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into PASSPORT_USER ( UserID, UserName, LoginID, Password, IsDisable, Sex, Birthday, Email, Wechat, Telephone, Description, Remarks, CreateTime, CreateUser, UpdateTime, UpdateUser, IsDelete, Version) values( #{userID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDisable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, 0, 1)
